summary.span: 为专为 Openwave 的 UP 浏览器设计的 WML 设备适配器集提供移动文本编写器适配器类。

span.span: Provides the mobile text writer adapter class for the WML device adapter set specifically designed for Openwave's UP browser.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: The softkey text to use for the link if the parameter is set to .

param.name: implicitSoftkeyLabel
param.span: 如果软键标签来自适配器本身（默认标签，或适配器指定的其他标签，如“Call”表示 控件），而不是应用程序作者显式指定的软键标签，则设置为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此调用可接下来调用以呈现文本，或通过调用 方法来呈现超链接内容，然后调用 方法。This call can be followed by calls to render text or by a call to the method to render the hyperlink contents, followed by a call to the method.

exception.span: 编写器已开始编写超链接，

span.span: the writer has already begun to write a hyperlink,
-or-
the response is a postback.
